com.viaoa.web

Interface OATableComponent


  • public interface OATableComponent
    Interface that defines the behavior for OATableComponents to work with an OATable. Any component that implements this interface can be used as a Table Column.

    For more information about this package, see documentation.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getColumns()
      Width of component, based on average width of the font's character.
      String getFormat() 
      com.viaoa.hub.Hub getHub()
      Hub that this component is bound to.
      String getPropertyPath()
      A dot (".") separated list of property names.
      OATable getTable()
      Set by OATable when this component is used as a column.
      String getTableHeading()
      Column heading when this component is used as a column in an OATable.
      String getToolTipText(int row, int col, String defaultValue)
      This will be called after the default OATable settings are set for the cell, and before the OATable.customizeRenderer is called.
      void setColumns(int x)
      Width of component, based on average width of the font's character.

      Hub that this component is bound to.

      A dot (".") separated list of property names.
